Articles.Content: Which section of the function menu is the "Mk3 engine mount" in? I cannot find it. I can only find it by going to the blue size section and looking under Mk3. If it isnt in the main function menu, Im wondering why?
Does the Mk3 engine mount offer any advantage over slapping engines on the back of your Mk3 fuel tank besides aesthetics?

1 hour ago, Terwin said:

Does the Mk3 engine mount offer any advantage over slapping engines on the back of your Mk3 fuel tank besides aesthetics?

There's a convenient lip for placing an elevator. And it doubles as a multicoupler that still has a central node.
And it's a way to close a cargo bay--the Dynawing would have needed an (empty) short tank or an (empty) Mk3->2.5m adapter if that mount didn't exist.
